privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how the Nota certa app collects, uses, and protects user information.
privacy.section1Text1: We collect the following information voluntarily provided by users:

section1List1.name: Name
section1List1.others: Information entered into the system, such as student names, classes, assessments, and school grades

privacy.section2Text1: We use the data only for:

section2List1.auth: Authentication and login to the app
section2List1.storage: Storage of data related to app usage

privacy.section2Text2: We do not use the data for commercial or advertising purposes.
privacy.section3Text1: We do not share, sell, or transfer personal data to third parties, except when required by law.
privacy.section4Text1: Data is stored in supabase, with appropriate security practices to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information.
privacy.section5Text1: The user may, at any time:

section5List1.edit: Request correction or deletion of data
section5List1.delete: Close the account and erase all information

privacy.section5Text2: To do so, contact by email: thiagommafort@gmail.com
privacy.section6Text1: We use strictly necessary cookies for:

section6List1.session: Maintaining the active session while the user is using the application.

privacy.section7Text1: This Privacy Policy may be updated. We recommend reviewing it periodically. By continuing to use the application, you agree to the updated terms.
